name: Detective Morpheus
description:
UPDATED 12/28/20! Longer story! Bug fixes! More stuff! Easter eggs! Tell your friends if they already played it to check it out again!

Currently, this is our bare-bones playable demo of the direction we're planning for this game. As we work on refining our tools, we're going to expand the playable area to a much larger town, with many more interactive objects and NPCs, building interiors, puzzles, and problems to solve.
